Major Ursa

Apache Notes

Restart Apache2

1 sudo apache2ctl graceful

Continuously Monitor Apache Error Log

1 sudo tail -f /var/log/apache2/error.log

Apache Configuration

Add a new VirtualHost to the Apache Config file

1 sudo vi /etc/apache2/sites-available/default

A simple VirtualHost entry

1 <VirtualHost *:80>  
2   ServerName majorursa.net
3   ServerAlias www.majorursa.net
4   DocumentRoot /var/www/majorursalia/
5 </VirtualHost>

A VirtualHost for a Drupal Site

 1 <VirtualHost *:80>  
 2   ServerName majorursa.net
 3   ServerAlias www.majorursa.net
 4   DocumentRoot /var/www/majorursalia/drupal-6.22
 5   <Directory /var/www/majorursalia/drupal-6.22/>
 6     AllowOverride All
 7     Options None
 8     Order allow,deny
 9     Allow from all
10   </Directory> 
11 </VirtualHost>

Phusion Passenger

Do NOT start phusion passenger on a whim, forget about it and leave it Running!
